summary.span: Provides a WPF core-level base class for content elements.

span.span: Provides a WPF core-level base class for content elements.

summary.span: Content elements are designed for flow-style presentation, using an intuitive markup-oriented layout model and a deliberately simple object model.

span.span: Content elements are designed for flow-style presentation, using an intuitive markup-oriented layout model and a deliberately simple object model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義下列的一般內容特性： defines the following common content characteristics: - 輸入： 所有從鍵盤、 滑鼠、 拖放作業、 手寫筆控制項和快速鍵的基本輸入擷取衍生的類別提供支援。Input: All derived classes provide support for basic input capture from keyboard, mouse, drag-and-drop operations, stylus controls, and accelerators. - 焦點： 所有衍生的類別都是可能可設定焦點。Focus: All derived classes are potentially focusable. (不過的預設可設定焦點狀態基底類別是`false`。(However, the default focusable state for the base class is `false`. 如需詳細資訊，使可設定焦點，請參閱。)此外，這個類別包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]可讓您周遊焦點相關的項目。For details on how to make a focusable, see .) In addition, this class contains [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that you can use for traversing the focus across related elements. - 事件：包含事件相關的輸入和焦點，則它也包含狀態變更的事件。Events: includes events that are related to input and focus; it also includes events for changes in state. 在許多情況下，事件是路由的事件。In many cases, the events are routed events. 在某些情況下，路由的事件都有通道和反昇路由策略，以在偵測到相同的狀態或條件的不同事件引發。In some cases, routed events have both tunneling and bubbling routing strategies, raised as separate events in response to the same state or condition. 此外，定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，可以提高路由傳送事件，可以新增或移除事件處理常式。Also, defines [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that can raise routed events and that can add or remove handlers to events. 共用許多常見[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]與。 shares many common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] with . 這些一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]不是來自共用的類別繼承。These common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] do not come from a shared class inheritance. 但不要共用通用的命名、 類似行為，以及類似內部實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]中每個類別。But they do share common naming, similar behavior, and similar internal implementation of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in each class. 相似度是因為和是每個類別的基底的項目，不過每個都有不同的目的，標記物件模型的行為。The similarity is because and are each classes that are an element base, although each has different intentions for its markup object model behavior. 特別的是，從衍生，以提供較低層級圖形支援轉譯矩形區域在複合的視窗中，而會延遲轉譯讓更多的概念更輕鬆地支援文件的情況下，流量和換行，例如通用的。In particular, descends from , which provides the lower-level graphics support for rendering a to a rectangular region within a composited window, whereas defers rendering so that concepts more common to document scenarios, such as flow and wrapping, are more easily supported. 這兩個相關類別也實作通用介面和。These two related classes also implement the common interfaces and .

span.para: 類別並未尚未定義流程樣式表示的完整內容項目中的所有層面。是立即在衍生的類別的。包含一組更完整的支援轉譯的其他成員內容主機和使用 WPF 架構層級配置系統中。

The class does not yet define all aspects of a complete content element for flow-style presentation. is an immediately derived class of . includes a more complete set of additional members that support rendering a within a content host and using the WPF framework-level layout system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可行的方式處理低階輸入是一個複雜的工作。Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task. 許多控制項實作特定事件標示為已處理，而取代為另一個更具直覺性事件的行為。Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event. 一般而言，控制項只會將平台輸入的事件，為已處理，如果沒有這麼做一些設計用意。Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so. 在某些情況下，這些設計目的不可能的輸入事件的特定處理的需要。In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires. 這些案例是該註冊處理常式取代`handledEventsToo`為`true`適合。It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate. 但您不應該這麼例行性。But you should not do this routinely. 叫用處理常式以回應所有事件，即使處理將會使得您自己的應用程式事件處理邏輯。Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic. 如果處理常式邏輯的很大，可能會看到效能降低。You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial. 您應該保留附加尚未處理的情況下，您已經發現特定控制項所處理的事件，您仍然想要處理的應用程式邏輯在開發程序的事件處理常式的使用。You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic. 避免處理行為的某些事件控制組合類別的另一個技術是使用該事件預覽替代方案。Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative. 例如，如果標示為已處理的類別處理，您可以加入處理常式改為。For example, if is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for instead. 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. ## Examples 下列範例會實作上叫用的處理常式將定義的處理常式附加至其中一個具名的項目頁面使用頁面上的事件`handledEventsToo` `true`。The following example implements a handler invoked on the event on a page that attaches a defined handler to one of the named elements on the page using `handledEventsToo` `true`. 會叫用這個處理常式，即使此路由上的另一個項目標示為已處理到達路由處理項目之前共用的事件資料。This handler would be invoked even if another element along the route marked the shared event data as handled before reaching the handling element in the route. [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#addhandlerhandledtoo)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#addhandlerhandledtoo)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業依預設，未啟用，且必須藉由設定刻意啟用至`true`。Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting to `true`. 超出此基本設定，拖放行為完全實作特定，不由定義或其他類型的基底項目類別。Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by or any other base element class. 某些控制項，例如，沒有預設行為，但不是具有這類行為的衍生的類別。Certain controls, for example, , do have a default behavior, but no derived classes have such a behavior. 如需拖放的詳細資訊，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md). 覆寫這個實作中的相依性屬性的中繼資料。 overrides the metadata for this dependency property in its implementation. 具體來說，指定這個屬性可讓屬性值繼承 (是`true`中繼資料中)。Specifically, designates that this property allows property value inheritance ( is `true` in metadata). 在此內容中的屬性值繼承表示，如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素指派透過本機值或最接近的父元素的值指派 （同樣地，有兩種預設的樣式，此值與樣式值或為區域數值），然後從該父項目值屬性系統指派給所有未指派的子項目。Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a local value), then the value from that parent element is assigned to all unassigned child elements by the property system. 這表示您可以指定是否允許拖放作業在根項目，然後將傳播到所有的值沒有特別將其指派的值的子項目`false`。This means that you can specify whether to allow drop operations at the root element and then propagate the value to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it a value of `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會設定中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example sets in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#AllowDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml#allowdrop)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要移除屬性的動畫，指定做為該屬性的識別項`dp`並指定`clock`為`null`。To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`. 這會移除動畫和動畫的屬性設定為其基底值。This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value. 不過，並不會停止原先相關聯的動畫時鐘。However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped. 指派給該時鐘的其他任何動畫會繼續執行。Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您檢查屬性是否動畫效果時，請注意，動畫會開始視為動畫呈現非動畫的起始點的第一個框架時。When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered. 如果如`animation`是`null`，然後移除任何目前的動畫，並保留屬性的目前值。If the for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held. 如果整個`animation`值是`null`、 從屬性移除所有動畫和屬性值還原成其基底值。If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value. 不過，並不會停止原先相關聯的動畫時間軸。However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped. 指派給該時間軸中的其他任何動畫會繼續執行。Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要可設定焦點，和兩者都必須是`true`。To be focusable, and must both be `true`. 請注意，幾乎所有衍生的類別不預設。Note that nearly all derived classes are not by default. 即使項目是在特定的樹狀結構中的可設定焦點且已啟用，事件處理，（例如，針對複合控制項） 可能會回應預覽焦點事件藉由禁止焦點，因此這個方法會傳回`false`。Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`. 焦點通常由兩個不同的概念： 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點，並不一定相同。Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical. 這個方法會設定邏輯焦點。This method sets the logical focus. 沒有以程式設計方式來設定鍵盤焦點，特別是; 方法鍵盤焦點是由使用者輸入所決定。There is no programmatic means to set keyboard focus specifically; keyboard focus is determined by user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)和[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果呼叫傳回`true`，和也`true`。If calling returns `true`, and are also `true`. 如果相關的屬性尚未`true`，當您呼叫，一或多個下列事件會依照下列順序引發： ， （來源為新的焦點目標） ， ，， （來源為新的焦點目標）。If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call , one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: , (source is the new focus target), , , , (source is the new focus target). ## Examples 下列範例會尋找指定的具名文件中的段落的頁面載入事件處理常式，並設定焦點。The following example is a page-loaded event handler that finds a specified named paragraph in the document and sets focus to it. 段落不在預設情況下，可設定焦點這個特定的段落有套用的樣式 （未顯示），使用樣式使其可設定焦點。Paragraphs are not focusable by default; this particular paragraph had a style applied (not shown) that used a style to make it focusable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有已取得焦點的項目收到鍵盤輸入。Only the focused element receives keyboard input. 在衍生的類別是可設定焦點，根據預設，某些衍生的類別可能會覆寫這個相依性屬性的中繼資料。Certain derived classes might override metadata for this dependency property such that the derived class is focusable by default. 當繼承或其衍生的類別，會覆寫這個相依性屬性的中繼資料，並會重新定義預設值，這個屬性是`true`。When inherited by or its derived classes, overrides the metadata for this dependency property and redefines the default value of this property to be `true`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立樣式使預設可設定焦點，並提供視覺化行為收到焦點時。The following example creates a style that makes a focusable by default and gives it a visual behavior when it receives focus. [!code-xaml[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#Focusable](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml#focusable)]

span.para: 當您衍生自，請考慮是否要讓您為可設定焦點，因為依預設它會為可設定焦點的項目。如果您希望您可設定焦點的項目時，覆寫衍生的類別靜態建構函式中的這個屬性的中繼資料，如下所示: [！ 的程式碼 csharp [CorePseudocode #UIElementShortOverride] (~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementshortoverride)] [！ code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementShortOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementshortoverride)] 其中之類型的中繼資料值覆寫上的類別名稱。

When you derive from , consider whether you want your element to be focusable, because by default it will not be focusable. If you want your element to be focusable, override the metadata for this property in your derived class static constructor as follows: [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementShortOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementshortoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementShortOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementshortoverride)] where is the class name of the type that you are overriding the metadata value on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性未不附加任何動畫則傳回值一定是相同傳回值。If no animations are attached to the property, then the return value is always identical to the return value. 如果附加的動畫，然後所有的可能動畫衍生值包括開始和停止值會被忽略，而且屬性值取決於所有可能的輸入。If there are animations attached, then all possible animation derived values including the start and stop values are ignored, and the property value is determined based on all other possible inputs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的虛擬實作這個方法會傳回`null`。The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`. 提供實際的實作。 provides a practical implementation. 替代的父代是用於事件的路由，在其中項目會建立替代父結構，讓它的事件會路由傳送偏離標準模式的視覺化樹狀目錄以標準的父代，路由的方式的情況下或在中向下預覽路由策略。Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.

summary.span: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.

span.span: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允許拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的來源。The event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 視覺回應強調拖放作業正在進行。The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotFocus As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.

span.span: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同的範圍與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中，鍵盤焦點會維持其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目已從`false`至`true`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，接收焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是類似的事件可追蹤之屬性維護的項目; 焦點狀態中的狀態變更的許多相同的情況下，就會引發事件。 is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the event is raised in many of the same circumstances. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為具有焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際具有焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.

span.span: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使將滑鼠指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取並且擷取之前拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查資料，以判斷實際項目具有滑鼠擷取的事件。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使指標位於其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 手寫筆通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取，並保留擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷已擷取的實際項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture. 此事件會建立這個類別的附加事件的別名，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入繫結支援命令與輸入裝置繫的結。Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices. 例如，實作輸入繫結包含滑鼠裝置特有的屬性。For example, implements input bindings that include properties that are specific to mouse devices. 輸入繫結的集合包含屬於此類型的輸入繫結和也會宣告執行個體的輸入繫結。The collection of input bindings includes both input bindings that pertain to the type and also input bindings that are declared on the instance. 相關的屬性， ，維持命令繫結的集合。A related property, , maintains a collection of command bindings. 這些繫結不同的輸入繫結，因為它們代表的下一個層級的命令處理它們的繫結至已知的命令和類別的特定處理常式的動作。These bindings differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands and class-specific handlers for them. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreInputBindings**oneOrMoreInputBindings* 一或多個項目 (通常或衍生類別)。One or more elements (typically the or derived classes). 每一個都應該要有和屬性設定。Each of these is expected to have a and attribute set.

value.span: 如果未啟用項目。否則， 。

span.span: if the element is enabled; otherwise, .

span.para: 這個屬性的預設實作快取的值，而且也會計算這個項目之父項目是否已啟用。(如果未啟用父代，無法在實際有效地啟用子元素 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].)如果您選擇覆寫這個實作，請確定呼叫基底實作以保留此行為。

The default implementation of this property caches the value and also calculates whether the parent element of this element is enabled. (If the parent is not enabled, the child element cannot be effectively enabled in practical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].) If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.

span.span: if this element has logical focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某個應用程式多個焦點分區，例如功能表內容和應用程式的其餘部分之間，可能會與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application. 在此案例中，應用程式 UI 的一個項目上只能是鍵盤焦點，不過，其他焦點分割中的特定項目可能仍會保留邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus. 如需有關邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立樣式使預設可設定焦點，並提供視覺化行為收到焦點時。The following example creates a style that makes a focusable by default and gives it a visual behavior when it receives focus. [!code-xaml[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#Focusable](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml#focusable)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsMouseDirectlyOver As Boolean
public: property bool IsMouseDirectlyOver { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the position of the mouse pointer corresponds to hit test results, which take element compositing into account.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the position of the mouse pointer corresponds to hit test results, which take element compositing into account.

value.span: 如果滑鼠指標位於相同的項目結果與點擊測試。否則， 。

span.span: if the mouse pointer is over the same element result as a hit test; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果滑鼠指標常值的項目，因為其適用於點擊測試。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element—as it is for a hit test. 如果滑鼠指標位於子項目上方，特別是在項目一部分的項目更深入的範本和複合 （compositing），這個屬性會是`false`。If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, in particular over elements that are part of an element's deeper template and compositing, this property will be `false`. 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果將滑鼠擷取由這個項目，而且這個屬性為`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會繼續傳回`true`直到失去滑鼠捕捉但其範圍不是指標。If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果手寫筆在元素上方。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element. 如果手寫筆改為透過子元素或元素的更深入的複合 （compositing） 的一部分的項目，這個屬性會是`false`。If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing, this property will be `false`. 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，而且這個屬性是`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會保持`true`直到手寫筆擷取遺失，且其範圍不是手寫筆。If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，這個屬性會保留`true`直到手寫筆擷取是遺失而且已超出其範圍的指標。If this element has stylus capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the pointer is out of its bounds. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 是可能無法如預期般特定控制項的較低層級文字輸入的事件。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 這是因為有些控制項會有複合控制項，或提供文字的高階版本的類別處理輸入處理和相關事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

span.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同範圍中，則邏輯焦點會與鍵盤焦點不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中、 鍵盤焦點會維持為，其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目從變更`true`至`false`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去擷取項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際遺失擷取的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 少數衍生類別，例如具有類似控制項的行為， ，可能具有固有的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。A few derived classes that have control-like behavior, for example, , might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然時滑鼠指標進入項目的邊界時發生，此事件的詳細追蹤逐字報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeave As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然曲目，當滑鼠離開項目時，此事件多逐字報告屬性值已經從`true`至`false`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse leaves an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseLeaveEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeaveEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數事件。The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 少數衍生類別，例如具有類似控制項的行為， ，可能具有固有的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。A few derived classes that have control-like behavior, for example, , might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseLeftButtonDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應至其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的版本。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到事件從取得焦點或擷取的項目，將滑鼠指標可能實際上是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Returns class-specific implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

span.span: Returns class-specific implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
The type-specific implementation.

span.para: 這個方法的實作會在呼叫的特定建構函式通常是實作中，並將其傳回做為傳回值。所有衍生的類別應該實作這個方法以提供它們自己的特定實作 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構。如需實作此模式的詳細資訊，請參閱。

The implementation of this method is typically to call the constructor of a specific implementation, and return it as the return value. All derived classes should implement this method in order to provide their own specific implementations to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure. For details on implementing this pattern, see .

summary.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

span.para: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。請注意，根據預設不是可設定焦點，因此設定刻意可能不是必要。

Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation. Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element. If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to . Note that by default a is not focusable, therefore setting deliberately might not be necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

This virtual method is raised when the value of the dependency property changes its value. The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. Notice that the event is not a routed event; Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. This method has no default implementation. Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

span.para: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。

Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation. Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element. If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是具有直接路由策略的路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體的處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding .
