summary.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

summary.span: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag target.

span.span: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewDragEnterEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewDragEnterEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: Identifies the routed event.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 是可能無法如預期般特定控制項的較低層級文字輸入的事件。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 這是因為有些控制項會有複合控制項，或提供文字的高階版本的類別處理輸入處理和相關事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循通道路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數事件。The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循通道路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數事件。The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseLeftButtonUpEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: Identifies the routed event.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseMove As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 都會發生這個事件項目界限，第一次進入滑鼠指標時，也會在滑鼠指標移時仍保持項目範圍內。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseMoveEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseMoveEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到這個事件與已取得焦點或擷取的項目時，滑鼠指標實際上可能是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式; 但也可以產生語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate| 型別的。 of type .| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 這個事件名稱所參考的資料指標不一定是文字游標 （有時稱為插入點）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反地，此內容中的資料指標是宣告畫面的圖形化顯示數個可能的輸入相關裝置或在 Windows 程式設計概念相關的物件。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 該物件由WPF 中的類別。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 輸入的系統可讓您變更這個資料指標，它代表在螢幕上的滑鼠指標位置時。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 您可以使用預先定義的值從列舉型別，或者您可以宣告為影像檔的自訂資料指標。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 接聽事件就不會針對資料指標管理而有效率的技術。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反地，每個項目應該定義自己的資料指標行為和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您只應依賴如果您不想要使用的 WPF 架構層級基底項目，或在異常的情況下，其中定義以每個項目為基礎的資料指標的行為不符合您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 如需有關在回應中實作資料指標行為，請參閱。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`參數的型別做為路由的事件的所有資料的通用基底類型; 不過，應該指定事件資料為最特定的事件資料類型是適用於所引發的事件，因為衍生的類別包含實際的特定資料是針對特定事件時引發此事件的屬性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 沒有狀態內容事件。它也會識別要引發哪個路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引發模式且同時與不同的路由的事件資料[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和資料類別，通常只包含與事件相關的屬性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件資料、 將事件的識別項附加至資料，，然後使用 以引發自訂的路由的事件的 事件資料執行個體。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. [!code-csharp[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/page1.xaml.cs#raiseevent)] [!code-vb[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#raiseevent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個項目按擷取不放，呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。If this element did not hold the capture, calling this method has no effect. 請考慮檢查值之前先呼叫這個方法。Consider checking the value of before you call this method. ## Examples 下列處理常式會擷取或釋放滑鼠按鈕狀態根據滑鼠捕捉。The following handler captures or releases mouse capture according to mouse button states. 此範例示範如何擷取的滑鼠移動所使用的替代方案的考量，而不是移動滑鼠指標[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。The example shows how to use captured mouse movement for alternative purposes other than moving the mouse pointer in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#UIElementMouseCapture](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/Trackball.cs#uielementmousecapture)] [!code-vb[ContentElementsSmorgasbord#UIElementMouseCapture](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/trackball.vb#uielementmousecapture)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的案例使用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是當您實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自訂路由事件，特別是當您實作在處理常式的 「 移除 」 邏輯時相關聯的 「 包裝函式 」 事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]層級。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 這會遵循範例 < 備註 > 一節會說明這種情況。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果沒有任何處理常式註冊以比對方法呼叫的輸入的參數的準則，則呼叫這個方法任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that match the input parameters for the method call. 如果一個以上的處理常式附加事件處理常式存放區會移除比對準則，第一個處理常式。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 這個行為會與一致[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行為`-=`運算子。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也`handler`可能`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 嘗試在提供做為任一個值`null`會引發例外狀況。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 這個方法會忽略`handledEventsToo`加上參數資訊，如果第一個處理常式提供簽章，可讓已處理事件的處理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 會移除任一類型的處理常式。Either type of handler is removed.

summary.span: Identifies the routed event.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StylusDown As StylusDownEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the stylus touches the digitizer while the stylus is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus touches the digitizer while the stylus is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StylusEnter As StylusEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然當手寫筆進入範圍的項目，這個多個事件的追蹤依其字面報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly StylusUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: Identifies the routed event.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextInput As TextCompositionEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已標示為處理複合控制項的內部實作。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 請參閱下方的 「 備註。See Remark below. 事件可能已標示為已處理的複合控制項的內部實作。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如，是複合控制項其中事件已標示為處理; 在其複合 （compositing）。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 控制項執行這項操作，因為控制項必須解譯某些類型的輸入，例如方向鍵，該控制項的特別意義。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果您使用您用來附加文字輸入的處理常式的事件，您可能會收到更好的結果。If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 這項技術規避大部分的情況下，其中已將這個事件標記為已處理控制項撰寫，而防止接收事件路由上的事件處理常式。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式，但也可以引發語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly TextInputEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate| 型別的。 of type .| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
